title: Instead of getting ignored in NA I decided to post this request here =/
body:
Can we please reduce gold and xp given on shutdowns to people who have a bounty, reducing it based on their level of bounty? I am just sick of losing games because of our one able carry getting caught out by an already fed jax or yasuo that proceeds to buy a full item so suddenly our carry can't compete. 

like I know carries are there to snowball but shutting down our hopes of winning at 25 mins in because of a fight that was decided in 2 seconds is kinda too much sometimes and everyone gets salty about it... Pretty please?

Thnx for taking the time to read this

replies.body: They already did that, well something like that. Don't you read the patch notes?

I think you'll find he's talking about reducing the gold/exp for killing someone with a bounty while you also have a bounty. So the people with bounties can't snowball harder than they already are. That said, I think the new system needs to be watched in live a bit more before they try anything like that.

Some people don't take the time to register things that are not straightforward.

Thanks for clearing this up

Eh from an objective perspective it could have been worded better. It's always hard because WE know what we mean but noone else does, so what we write might make perfect sense to us, but be vague or misleading to others. Part of being human, but you're welcome.
